inn1.comm: loosener outside off which Amla mistimes to the off side
nice length and it cramps him for room, he stays back and defends
that disappeared quite quickly, this wasn't a bad ball, not that much width but Amla played it late and managed to slice it well wide of backward point and third man
came up on him a bit quickly as he stabbed it to cover
outside edge but well wide of second slip, pushed at it away from the body but controlled
good bounce and carry, 136 kph, outside off and holds its line before reaching the keeper
this one really kicked up on him, he had to fend it almost in front of his face
fuller ball this time and Amla very softly pushes it to the on side
nice tight line, 139 kph, Amla defends it in front of the middle stump
139 kph, this one really skidded through and hurried him up, trapped high on the pad and down leg, stifled appeal
141 kph, Amla merely used the pace on that delivery to work it away with ease wide of midwicket, super use of the wrists
better ball, extra bounce outside off and pushed to the off side
133 kph, gives him a bit of room and de Kock steers it high on the bat to the off side
134 kph, hits a good length on the off stump and he defends down the pitch
139 kph, fullish in length and straighter and he knocks it to the on side

chance for a run out! Amla had given up, de Kock pushed it towards point and set off, both batsmen didn't run with any conviction and Rohit's throw to the striker's end was way off the mark as well, poor cricket all round
gives him width outside off and Amla mistimes it to the off side
goes through nice and straight to the keeper, no shot offered
keeps him pinned to the back foot as he punches it to the off side
141 kph, brings him forward this time by bowling it fuller but he can't beat mid-off
not the right length, short and it sat up nicely for de Kock to pull him in front of square, placed wide of midwicket
fuller in length on the off stump and he drives down the track
confusion again as de Kock knocks it to the on side and Amla steps out for the single and had to head back
140 kph, de Kock decides to give the charge, meets it on the half volley and doesn't time it very well but places it well wide of mid-on
good length outside off and he leaves it alone
outside edge! Amla playing on the back foot to a ball that moved away, didn't cover the line and the edge went past slip and Yadav dived at third man but couldn't stop it

Caught at short square leg but they're checking for a no-ball for height! And Amla has to go. It was a full toss close to the waist, Amla looked to flick it away and he found Yuvraj who cupped it easily, the side angle showed the ball to be within the limit so it was a legal delivery
good length outside off and he leaves it alone
142.5 kph, cramps him up for room and he punches it to the off side
good length outside off and he gets forward and defends to cover, 136 kph
136 kph, good length on the off stump and he stays back and defends, good line too
133 kph, tries to disturb his rhythm by coming down the track, checks his shot and plays it to the on side
133 kph, does it again and he doesn't succeed, down the pitch and he can only push it to cover
he comes down the track and pushes it just wide of mid-off
139 kph, a bit too straight this time as he easily flicks it behind square
136 kph, bowls it a bit full and wide outside off and he doesn't offer a shot

phew! 'Swinging' Shami really sliced de Kock in half there! On the off stump and de Kock looked to flick it away and the ball came back and sailed through the tiny gap between bat and pad, cleared the stumps
stabs it down the track and Shami flicks it back towards him and the ball hits de Kock's shin
stabs at it again, this time the ball drops in front of cover
pokes his bat out and checks his shot, takes the edge and the ball goes to third man
141 kph, this was wide outside off and moving away, doesn't offer a shot
gets forward and drives and Dhawan does well at mid-off to slide and stop it, this outfield is quick so that could have gone for four
pushes a length ball to mid-off

And Ishant has struck! Davids fails to make use of this opportunity, he comes forward to a length ball outside off, looks to defend but gets an outside edge to second slip, Raina does well to move to his left and take it on the fall
keeps it outside off and he leaves it alone
that was a jaffa! Ishant bowls a beauty outside off, forced Duminy to play at it and the ball just moved away and nearly took the edge, good carry too

two for the over and Ishant really does look a different bowler here! Duminy was squared up the previous ball and this time he was on the back foot to defend, didn't cover the line properly at all and the ball moved away and took the outside edge to second slip, Raina in business again and he times his dive forward well, takes it inches off the turf
136 kph, Ishant foxes him with extra bounce, AB gets a wake up call, hops at the crease and fends it off the glove, did well to keep it down
this was short outside off and punched to the off side
keeps it outside off and he leaves it alone
138 kph, keeps it nice and straight and de Kock can only defend it
de Kock not getting any room at all to free his arms, 137 kph, he can only push it to cover
hammers a bouncer down the leg side and wide called
144 kph, could be the fastest recorded ball today, outside off and he pushes it to the off side
fullish in length outside off and he drives him down to cover
140 kph, gets away with one on the pads ad he flicks it straight to square leg

that was a lovely drive but Shami's disappointed he didn't stop that, full on middle and de Kock shows the full face of the bat and merely pushes it through the line, dead straight and Shami sticks out his right hand
good length on the off stump and he stays back and defends
classic on drive! Half volley from Ishant on middle and leg and AB shows the full face of the bat and drives wide of mid-on
133 kph, keeps it on a good length outside off and he safely leaves it alone
133 kph, can't really call that an effort ball, outside off and AB's happy to leave it alone
little better this time, brings it back in and AB does well to come forward and defend
133 kph, seems to be consistent with his speeds, outside off and coming in and he safely leaves it alone
130 kph, gets away with a half volley on the pads, neatly flicked away but there's a deep square leg to save runs
keeps it very straight and he does well to come forward and defends
this was fuller in length on middle and leg and he drives him down to mid-on
this was banged in short and he pulled it with force and it went really quickly to Ishant at fine leg, does well to cut it off
full and swinging in and he defends it to mid-on
140 kph, nearly edged that! This was full and moving away and de Kock was tempted into chasing it, nearly took the toe of the bat
135 kph, fairly consistent with his line there, comes back in after pitching and he comes well forward to defend
137 kph, lovely drive! Poor line this time, full and moving away and it allows AB to find that gap between mid-off and cover with ease, mid-off gave up chasing
stays behind the line and punches it to the off side
134 kph, hurries him up on the back foot and he hops and defends
135 kph, he fires this one fuller and de Kock jams it out back to the bowler
133 kph, he tucks it away towards midwicket and there's confusion, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but de Kock was in
full outside off and he drives and just beats mid-off, Jadeja chases
140 kphh, gets across and mistimes it to the off side
140 kph, bang! Yadav bowls a friendly length and gives de Kock room to free his arms, he gets his bat down quickly and thrashes it wide of mid-off
140 kph, comes round the wicket and he pushes it to the off side
fuller in length and he gets an inside edge to the on side
146 kph, a bit too straight and he flicks it straight to short midwicket
134 kph, fuller in length and he looks to drive through the on side but can't beat mid-on
down the leg side and there's a sound as he looks to flick it, the ball clips the thigh before going to Dhoni who appeals
138 kph, de Kock comes down the pitch and forces it away behind square
135 kph, tucks him up for room and he defends it with soft hands
lands it on a good length outside off and he safely leaves it alone
he gives him a lot of width outside off, hops and cuts him down to deep point, there's a sweeper there
that was a good yorker! Swinging in and AB nearly lost his balance as he jammed it out to the on side
brilliant fielding by Raina at short cover to dive to his right and stop a booming drive
145 kph, comes down the track and mistimes the drive wide of cover, played it one-handed
144 kph, round the wicket and de Kock decided not to offer a shot, hits his thigh and rolls towards fine leg
comes down the track to upset his rhythm but he can only punch it to the off side
141 kph, shot! De Kock's timing was perfect that, was just a punch off the front foot, too straight, shows the middle of the bat and plays it dead straight past the bowler
fullish outside off and he drives to the off side
140 kph, he steps down the track and checks his shot towards mid-on
hits the deck hard and AB arches back at the crease and fends it towards point
141 kph, certainly not his best ball, short and wide and he gets away with it as AB slaps it straight to sweeper cover
drifts down the leg side and the ball clips his pads and DHoni dives and gets a glove to it
138 kph, good length on middle and easily worked away down to fine leg
136 kph, too wide outside off, on a good length and de Kock was slightly forward before he sliced it between backward point and cover
he goes back at the crease and knocks it down to square leg
137 kph, this was full and wide and AB reached out and ended it spooning it well in front of third man
he comes down the pitch and can only play it to mid-off
Dropped by Rahane at short fine leg! This was short down leg and de Kock pulled and it was quite a regulation catch to Rahane, was a bit too late to react
he stays back and defends
Ashwin bowls the quicker one straightaway which de Kock cuts to point
fuller and he gets forward to defend
gives it a lot more air and defends
this was shorter in length and de Kock hammers it to sweeper cover
once again he bowls the quicker, shorter one, punched off the back foot to long-on
goes back and turns it behind square on the leg side
he stays back and defends to the off side
flatter one and he knocks it to the on side
shorter one and he slaps it straight to cover
he tucks it straight to square leg
fullish on the pads and he drills it down to long-on
another single down to long-on
tucks it against the turn to midwicket
quicker delivery and he drills this one down to long-on

De Kock dropped for the second time and it's Yuvraj this time! De Kock mistimed the loft over the on side and Yuvraj was running back from mid-on, he ran around it a bit but had it covered, it just didn't stick, these catches aren't the easiest but Yuvraj will be very disappointed
comes well forward and defends
gets down to sweep and can't beat the on side
takes a single wide of cover
gets forward and drives uppishly to cover
flatter delivery and he gets forward and defends
drills this one to long-on
quicker one and he pushes it to long-on
comes forward and drives him to long-off
flatter one and he flicks it wide of midwicket
slower through the air and he defends
quicker one and he makes a bit of room and punches wide of point
AB comes down the track and chips it away over midwicket, drops well short of the sweeper
good turn and bounce from outside leg! squared up de Kock as he got a leading edge
takes a single to long-off
he goes back and punches it to mid-on
he goes back at the crease and punches it to sweeper cover
tucks it away to square leg and brings up his fifty! I suspect many of you India fans are fearing the worst already
lovely drive, half volley wide outside the off stump and he drives him wide of cover
flatter one and he stays back and punches it down the track
slower through the air and he drives down the ground
he saw de Kock advancing and fired it full, adjusted late and de Kock could only defend it to the on side
goes back and tucks it to the on side
stays back and punches with the turn to long-on
he comes well forward and defends
takes a single to square leg and brings up the SA 100, they've had to work much harder for this
plays the reverse sweep but can't beat short third man
lovely shot, tossed up and AB made room, went down the track and chipped it inside out over cover
fullish in length and he comes forward to drive to the off side
gets forward and drills it down to long-off
slower through the air and he comes forward and drives down the track
flatter one and he stays back and knocks it wide of midwicket
gets forward and drives down the track
comes down the track and he drills it down to long-on
sweeps fine but not enough on it to go to the fine leg rope
stops before delivery, tossed up more, he gets forward to defend
goes back and tucks it away down to square leg
stays back and chops it wide of short third man and sets off
flatter delivery and he tucks it wide of square leg
gives him width outside off and he chops it down to cover
makes room and drives a fuller one to deep cover
makes room and drives it towards extra cover
he stays back and punches him down the ground to long-on
slower through the air and he defends
stays back and forces it away to deep midwicket
goes back at the crease and works it to the on side
pauses before delivery, tossed up and driven to long-on
finds the gap well, this was dropped short and de Kock swiveled and pulled it with force along the ground and beats the sweeper at deep square leg
edged and off Dhoni's gloves! Outside edge and it went quickly, brushed Dhoni's gloves and lobbed towards short third man
down the pitch and he meets it on the half volley and forces it to deep midwicket
gets forward and drives to cover
knocks it to the on side
goes back and punches it down to long-on
round the wicket and Raina bowls it slower, defended
slower again and de Kock makes room and mistimes the punch
turns it to the on side side and can't pinch a single
down the track and flicks it away forcefully down to deep midwicket, Yuvraj dives and nearly over runs it
outside off and he punches it to sweeper cover
on the pads and he knocks it to short fine leg
full on the pads and drilled to long-on
stays back and punches it straight to extra cover
bit too straight and he tucks it away down to square leg
take that! Kohli comes round the wicket and tosses it up, de Kock comes half forward and nonchalantly flicks it over deep midwicket, seemed quite effortless
gets forward and drills it down the ground
boundaries are flowing! Tossed up wide outside off and AB makes room and thrashes it wide of cover
goes back and punches it down to long-on
goes back and punches it wide of cover
clipped away and well stopped by Kohli at midwicket
he makes room and drives him to cover
he stays back and pushes it to mid-on
makes room and slaps it straight to cover
forces a length ball straight to mid-on
comes down the track and punches it to point
knocks it down to deep midwicket
makes room and drives to deep cover, throw is to Kohli who fires it to the keeper and hits the stumps, de Kock was ambloing towards the crease
tucks it away to deep midwicket
drives a fuller delivery down to long-off
comes down the track and forces it to long-on
tucks it down to Ashwin at short fine leg for a single
down the track and hammers it back to the bowler
good running, tucks it wide of square leg and takes the first one quickly
punches it wide of cover for a single
drives a full ball down to sweeper cover to bring up his fifty! Rescuing the side after losing three early wickets
he drives him down to long-on
drills a length ball down to long-on
De Kock comes down the pitch and hammers it down the track and it strikes AB who's falls on his back
full toss! Thank you very much, goes to 98 with a loft over deep midwicket, his second six
Ashwin round the wicket, drives him down to sweeper cover
full outside off and driven to cover
wow! Tossed up on the pads and AB gets on his knee and sweeps effortlessly, lands on the grass bank over square leg
clips it to deep midwicket to get de Kock on strike
quicker one and he punches it down to cover off the back foot, 99 now
stays back and clips it with the turn to midwicket
138 kph, full and swinging on the leg stump, makes room and clips it down to long-on
Man in a hurry, he makes room and comes down the track looking to bash it away, mistimes it down the track
a soft clip to the on side and it's an easy single, de Kock gets his third century of the series! What a find for SA! Especially with Smith's ODI career on the wane
makes room and drives him down to cover
a length ball has been punished! AB stayed back at the crease and pulled it with ease over deep midwicket
make that two in two! This more audacious than the previous one, down the track and spoons a half volley it over deep cover
slower ball and he gets forward and pushes it to the off side
136 kph, fires that full outside off and he slashes and misses
tucks him up for room and he chops it wide of point

pinched the gap but you would have to say that one of the fielders should have stopped it, makes room and drives a full ball wide of cover, the fielder dives but doesn't cover it, the sweeper gives up the chase
that's a high toss clipped to the on side, close to being called a no ball

makes room to swing and he misses! Ishant bowls an off cutter on the stumps, de Kock exposes all three and swings, the ball clips the top of the leg stump, the stumps are erect and the bails go flying
quick single to mid-off, put pressure on the fielder
shows the full face and drives him to long-on
full on middle and leg and clipped to midwicket
makes room and drives a length ball to deep cover and hurries the second run
fullish in length outside off and he jams it down to cover
drives a low full toss down the ground to long-on
keeps it nice and straight, can only defend this one
tries to drive wide of cover but well stopped
Miller makes a bit of room and swings behind square on the on side
nothing unconventional about that one, he had the width outside off, length ball, he bends forward and elegantly cuts him wide of point
just clears mid-off! AB mistimes the loft and spoons it over mid-off, Yuvraj makes a good attempt at chasing it and he dives but the ball beats him, very tough
stays back and clips it to the on side
gets forward and flicks wide of mid-on
plays the reverse sweep but can't beat short third man
slower through the air and punched wide of cover
he paused before delivery but to no avail, AB made room, played it inside out and lofted it flat over deep cover
no slip so easy runs there, length ball outside off, that was a controlled edge from Miller wide of the keeper
much better, 137 kph, tucked him up for room, he came forward to defend
fuller ball on the stumps and he drills it back to the bowler
141 kph, that  was a low full toss which he forces down to long-off
century for the SA captain! Too straight and he shuffles and tucks it behind square on the on side, off just 96 balls
another edge and this was much closer to Dhoni, not the worst delivery, coming back in and cramping him up for room, adjusted well and guided it wide of Dhoni
Ashwin is punished for bowling a half tracker! AB went back and clubbed it high over deep midwicket
fullish in length and clipped to midwicket
Miller comes down the track to a flighted delivery and sends it rows back over long-on!
quicker one and drilled down to long-on
yorker length and he drills it to the off side
bowls length and he rocks back at the crease and slaps it to deep cover
stays back at the crease and he punches it to the off side

some relief for India here, AB shuffles a long way across his stumps to flick it away, Yadav bowls it fuller and the ball clips the pads, you could see the leg stump so a fairly easy decision for the umpire
this was really short and wide and Miller hopped at the crease and slapped it in front of square over the infield
wide outside off and he slashes and misses
length ball on the stumps but cramps him up for room, he defends
he comes down the track and spoons it just over Kohli at mid-off, checked his shot
slower ball and he tucks this one to midwicket
135 kph, misses out on a low full toss and drills this one down to mid-off
looked like another low full toss which he drives to long-on, quiet over so far
well bowled, saw him advance so bowled a slower ball and shorter, he could only place it to third man
finds the gap behind square on the leg side, Shami drops it short down the leg side, Miller swivels and pulls and finds the gap at fine leg
a bit straight and he tucks it to the on side
on the pads and flicked away wide of midwicket
Shami duly punished for not bowling to his field, fine leg was up, he drifted on the pads and good wrist work by Miller to flick it past square leg and short fine
drops it with soft hands to the off side and sets off
137 kph, better delivery by Shami, yorker length and squirted to the off side
good yorker by Ishant, he made room to squirt it out but missed it
picks deep midwicket and Ishant takes his 100th ODI wicket! Slower ball and McLaren makes room and swings, Yadav runs forward and takes it well in front of the rope
this was fired full and wide outside off and he made room and squirted it out to deep cover
short of a length and he tucks it to midwicket
ends the over with a yorker, well bowled Ishant, he manages to dig it out
fires that full on the pads and he flicks it to deep midwicket
gets away with another one on the pads as he works it straight to Ishant at short fine leg
well bowled, fired that full on the pads and he flicked it to midwicket, India pulling things back
breaks the shackles with a boundary, he errs by dropping short, Parnell pulls wide of midwicket, Kohli gives it his best running from long-on but dives in vain
full outside off and he drives to mid-off
punishes a low full toss! Not such a great over for India, gives him width and the field is up on the off side, sped away past cover
stays back and flicks it away straight to midwicket
drifts on the pads and he flicks it away in the air down to long-on
good over so far, keeps it full and close to the yorker length, can only jam it out for no runs
fires that full outside off and Miller slams it along the turf to deep cover and Ishant does well to slide and cut it off, could easily have over-run it
full outside off and driven down to sweeper cover
another low full toss put away! Wide outside off, Miller takes him down town, through the line and a flat six over wide long-off
the short one gets Parnell! Rising towards the face and he takes evasive action and yet goes ahead with the pull, miscues it and Rohit takes it easily at deep square leg

at first it looked like he miscued it but it traveled alright! Makes room to a length ball and swings over deep midwicket, went up miles in the air and still had enough to clear the rope, a welcome fifty for Miller
full on the pads and flicked away to deep square leg
chopped it onto his stumps, Shami bowls it short, Philander makes room to swing, inside edge lands on top of the middle stump, stumps are upright and the bails go for a toss
that was well played, short ball expectedly, Tsotsobe rode the bounce and spooned it over the keeper, Ishant was fine at third man
round the wicket and Miller makes room and drills it down to long-off and they take 2, SA have passed 300
